participant_abstract.sent: A meeting was held at 16:00 on 4th February to discuss the detailed design of the new TV remote control.
The industrial designer and the user interface designer presented several prototypes from which a selection was made.
The selected prototype was evaluated against the initial design criteria.
The product was costed, and some minor adjustments were made it to bring it within the target cost.

participant_decisions.sent: A selection was made from three prototypes.
Choices of colours, shapes and materials were finalised.
The selected prototype was decided to have satisfied the design criteria.
A minor alteration was made to the number of colours to bring the final design within the cost limit.
The group had performed sucessfully in producing the final project.

participant_problems.sent: There was some difficulty producing the costing.
Some items in the cost sheet were not well explained.
Difficulty in deciding what features must be omitted to stay within cost.
